title: Consultant and Software Engineer Intern
description: Product and Software Engineer Intern for a large banking client. Worked on launching Virtual Bank platform and developing APIs and microservices.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Backend Software Engineer Intern. Worked on charge tokenization service and building an internal metrics tool for the product's webpage loading times.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Teaching Assistant for an introductory Data Structures and Algorithms course at Carnegie Mellon University. Taught labs, recitations, office hours, and worked on course materials.
